sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Slider from 'react-animated-slider'; import 'react-animated-slider/build/horizontal.css'; import './banner.css' function banner() { const slides = [ { title: 'The Land of Teast!', description: 'Best Quality Products', url: process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/pickle1.png',offer:'50%',}, { title: 'Garlic pickle', description: 'NATURAL', url: process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/pickle2.png' }, { title: 'Organic Vegitables', description: 'GARLIC', url: process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/pickle3.png' }, { title: 'Fresh lemon', description: 'TEASTY', url: process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/pickle4.png' }, ]; return (
{slides.map((slide, index) =>

{slide.title}

{slide.description}

50% OFF

SUPER

SALE

From coming week shoping.
) }
) } export default banner
